title: &pizza - Dulles Airport
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. DC/Maryland area chain of build-your-own-pizza restaurants. This airport outlet offers vegan beef crumble, Daiya cheese, a garbanzo spicy bean mix, vegan suitable pesto and garlic sauce and marinara.
streetAddress: Dulles Airport, Concourse C, Gate C28
